translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

The official letter from Your Lordship of the 29th of last month was presented to the Government, and with it I detained Hipólito José Pereira Dutra, whom I now send escorted to the army, along with a copy of Your Lordship’s letter, Sir.

God keep Your Lordship  
Secretary of War Affairs in Caçapava, May 9, 1840.  
Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre

Most Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães.  
Letter from the Excellent Minister of War dated May 9, received on the 15th of the same month, acknowledging the receipt of the prisoner Hipólito.  
Colonel Vieira.
